title: 347 - Charris Ford (Environmental Activist/Rapper/Very Cool Dude)
description:
I first met Charris at a beach party near Barcelona almost ten years ago. He remains one of the most creative, charming, and inspiring people I know. He’s off the grid, in pretty much any sense you can think of. If you’d like to know more about him and his family, check him out on the MonkeyTooth podcast.

Find me on Instagram or Twitter.

Please consider supporting this podcast on Patreon.

This Amazon affiliate link kicks a few bucks back my way.



This is a public episode. If you’d like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit chrisryan.substack.com/subscribe
